Instance.description: Tuning for a Batuu-style Mission. These Gigs have no deadline, and use dynamically chosen Objectives instead of an Aspiration.

Tunable.name: allow_duplicate_objectives
Tunable.description: If checked, the same Objective can be chosen multiple times for this Mission. If unchecked, selected Objectives will be ignored by the remaining Mission Objective Data.

TunableList.name: cycling_display_data
TunableList.description: A list of name/description pairs that will be cycled for each completion of the tuned Aspiration for this Mission. If this list is empty, the Display Name and Display Description from the Display Data will be used.

TunableTuple.description: The Title and Description to use when this display data is being used.

Tunable.name: customer_description
Tunable.description: The display description for this entry. The Active Sim is passed in for the first token.

Tunable.name: mission_name
Tunable.description: The display name for this entry. The Active Sim is passed in for the first token.

TunableList.name: mission_objective_data
TunableList.description: A list of data used to create a single Objectives for this Mission.

Tunable.name: completes_mission
Tunable.description: If checked, completion of this Objective will also complete the Mission.

TunableList.name: completion_loot
TunableList.description: A list of loot operations to apply when the objective is complete.

TunableList.name: lot_specific_situations
TunableList.description: A mapping of Lots to Situations that should start when this Objective is active and the Sim has loaded into the Zone for the tuned Lot.

Tunable.name: Lot Description
Tunable.description: The lot this situation should start in.

TunableList.name: Situations
TunableList.description: The list of Situations to start when the Sim has loaded into the Zone for the tuned Lot Description.

Tunable.description: A Situation to start.

TunableVariant.name: object_state_changes_on_active
TunableVariant.description: If enabled, allows setting the tuned state on all matching objects when this objective is active and able to be completed.

TunableTuple.name: enabled
TunableTuple.description: The objects and states to set on them.

Tunable.name: desired_state
Tunable.description: State that will be set to the objects.

TunableEnum.description: Find all of the objects based on these tags.

TunableVariant.name: object_target
TunableVariant.description: Define the set of objects that this interaction is applied to.

TunableTuple.name: all_objects
TunableTuple.description: The target are all objects. Find all objects that have the tags.

TunableTuple.name: room_objects
TunableTuple.description: The target are all objects in the same room as the interaction target that have the tags.

TdescFragTag.name: tests
TdescFragTag.description: If pass these tests, the object's state will be changed to Desired State.

TunableVariant.name: object_state_changes_on_complete
TunableVariant.description: If enabled, allows setting the tuned state on all matching objects when this objective is complete.

TunableTuple.name: enabled
TunableTuple.description: The objects and states to set on them.

Tunable.name: desired_state
Tunable.description: State that will be set to the objects.

TunableEnum.description: Find all of the objects based on these tags.

TunableVariant.name: object_target
TunableVariant.description: Define the set of objects that this interaction is applied to.

TunableTuple.name: all_objects
TunableTuple.description: The target are all objects. Find all objects that have the tags.

TunableTuple.name: room_objects
TunableTuple.description: The target are all objects in the same room as the interaction target that have the tags.

TdescFragTag.name: tests
TdescFragTag.description: If pass these tests, the object's state will be changed to Desired State.

Tunable.name: pick_objective_when_activated
Tunable.description: If checked, the objective will be picked only once we can actually activate it. Otherwise, the objective will be picked when the mission itself is set up. Enable this if you need to test for data that comes from previous objectives.

Tunable.name: requires_previous_objective_complete
Tunable.description: If checked, this objective can only be completed if the previous objective in the Mission has been completed.

TunableList.name: weighted_objectives
TunableList.description: A list of tested, weighted objectives. A set of tests are run against the active Sim. If the tests pass, this objective and the weight are added to a list for randomization. Only one Objective is selected.

TunableTuple.description: A set of tests that are run against the Sim. If the tests pass, this objective and the weight are added to a list for randomization.

Tunable.name: objective
Tunable.description: The objective that will be provided if the tests pass.

TdescFragTag.name: tests
TdescFragTag.description: The tests that must pass for this objective to be valid.

Tunable.name: weight
Tunable.description: The weight of this objective against the other passing objectives.

TunableVariant.name: mission_reputation_text
TunableVariant.description: If enabled, allows tuning for reputation changes in the reward description.

Tunable.name: enabled
Tunable.description: The string that shows the Reputation change for this Mission. This is used in the Mission Reward Description.

Tunable.name: mission_rewards_description
Tunable.description: The description of the rewards for this mission. This will be used in both the Mission Picker and in the Career Panel. Current tokens are: 0.String - Gig Pay (Since these pay in bucks, the ValueString of BuckTypeToDisplayString in bucks_utils module tuning will be used) 1.String - Mission Reward Text 'Reward Object: Fish Bowl' 2.String - Mission Reputation Text 'Resistance + First Order -'

TunableVariant.name: mission_rewards_text
TunableVariant.description: If enabled, allows tuning for extra rewards in the reward description.

Tunable.name: enabled
Tunable.description: The string that shows the reward for this Mission. This is used in the Mission Reward Description.

TunableVariant.name: mission_trait
TunableVariant.description: If enabled, allows tuning a trait that is added to the Sim any time they have this mission. The trait is removed upon mission completion.

Tunable.name: enabled
Tunable.description: This Trait is given to Sims when they have this Mission. It's removed when this mission is complete.

TunableTuple.name: objective_completion_audio
TunableTuple.description: An audio sting to play when a mission objective is complete.

Tunable.name: audio
Tunable.description: The sound to play.

Tunable.name: immediate_audio
Tunable.description: If checked, this audio will be triggered immediately, nothing will block. ex. Earbuds audio will be played immediately while the Sim is routing or animating.

TunableVariant.name: joint_name_hash
TunableVariant.description: Specify if the audio is attached to a slot and, if so, which slot. Otherwise the audio will be attached to the object's origin.

Tunable.name: enabled
Tunable.description: The name of the slot this audio is attached to.

Tunable.name: play_on_active_sim_only
Tunable.description: If enabled, and audio target is Sim, the audio will only be played on selected Sim. Otherwise it will be played regardless Sim is selected or not. If audio target is Object, always set this to False. Otherwise the audio will never be played. ex. This will be useful for Earbuds where we want to hear the music only when the Sim is selected.
